description: Microsoft shared a workaround for Linux boot issues triggered by August security updates on dual-boot systems with Secure Boot enabled [...]
title: Microsoft shares temp fix for Linux boot issues on dual-boot systems

description: Microsoft has released a new Windows 10 22H2 beta (KB5041582) with memory leak and crash fixes for Insiders in the Beta and Release Preview channels. [...]
title: New Windows 10 22H2 beta fixes memory leaks and crashes

description: A wave of attacks that started in July 2024 rely on a less common technique called AppDomain Manager Injection, which can weaponize any Microsoft .NET application on Windows. [...]
title: Hackers now use AppDomain Injection to drop CobaltStrike beacons

description: ​Halliburton, one of the world's largest providers of services to the energy industry, has confirmed a cyberattack that forced it to shut down some of its systems earlier this week. [...]
title: US oil giant Halliburton confirms cyberattack behind systems shutdown

description: The federal police in Argentina (PFA) have arrested a 29-year-old Russian national in Buenos Aires, who is facing money laundering charges related to cryptocurrency proceeds of the notorious North Korean hackers' Lazarus Group.' [...]
title: Russian laundering millions for Lazarus hackers arrested in Argentina

description: A developer that researchers now track as Greasy Opal, operating as a seemingly legitimate business, has been fueling the cybercrime-as-a-service industry with a tool that bypasses account security solutions and allows bot-led CAPTCHA solving at scale. [...]
title: Greasy Opal's CAPTCHA solver still serving cybercrime after 16 years
